[TEXT]
<line: 29> THIS MATTER is before the Court on James M. Dedman, IV’s 
<line: 30> Application for Admission to Practice Pro Hac Vice of John Stephen Berry. It 
<line: 31> appearing that John Stephen Berry is a member in good standing with the Georgia 
<line: 32> State Bar and will be appearing with James M. Dedman, IV, a member in good 
<line: 33> standing with the Bar of this court, that all admission fees have been paid, and that 
<line: 34> the email address of the attorney seeking admission has been provided, the court 
<line: 35> enters the following Order.  

[TITLE]
<line: 37> ORDER 

[TEXT]
<line: 39> IT IS, THEREFORE, ORDERED that James M. Dedman, IV’s 
<line: 40> Application for Admission to Practice Pro Hac Vice (#13) of John Stephen Berry 

[TEXT]
<line: 2> is GRANTED, and that John Stephen Berry is ADMITTED to practice, pro hac
<line: 3> vice, before the Bar of this court while associated with James M. Dedman, IV.

[TEXT]
<line: 5> Signed: August 16, 2017

[TEXT]
<line: 7> Dennis L. Howell
<line: 8> United States Magistrate Judge
